Monoheal.name: Monoheal
Monoheal.description: A basic healing device that restores 15% of the user's health. Due to it being made with cheap ingredients, the healing potency is quite low.

Diheal.name: Diheal
Diheal.description: A healing device that restores 35% of the user's health. Its healing potency is higher than a Monoheal thanks to the higher-quality ingredients.

Triheal.name: Triheal
Triheal.description: A potent healing device that restores 65% of the user's health. The rarer yet potent ingredients make this quite expensive.

Ultiheal.name: Ultiheal
Ultiheal.description: The ultimate healing device. This restores 100% of the user's health, but is extremely rare and takes up a large amount of inventory space.

Nullifier.name: Nullifier
Nullifier.description: An area-of-effect status aliment healing item. Removes the status aliments of any Beta Union members in the 25 Stud area.

Healifier.name: Healifier
Healifier.description: An area-of-effect healing item that restores the health of any Beta Union members in the 20 Stud area by 50%.

Revivafier.name: Revivafier
Revivafier.description: An area-of-effect reviving item that revives any knocked-out Beta Union members in the 20 Stud area.
